long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Voaux: Your Text-to-Speech Companion

Voaux is your gateway to a seamless text-to-speech experience right in your browser. With a diverse selection of natural-sounding voices, Voaux brings your written content to life, effortlessly transforming English text into captivating audio.

Customize your listening experience by choosing the ideal speaking rate, effortlessly pausing or resuming playback at your convenience.

[Currently supports english language only]
